title: Which ink pens are better: Baoer's or Parker's? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have been using Parker pens for the last seven years. They write very well and their build quality is excellent(except the Parker Beta, which I found downright horrible). Over the years though I feel that the quality of Parker pens has come down. They are still good but there are other brands you can go for in the sub 1000 rupee range. I’ve personally tried only the Baoer Eight Horse Fountain pen which cost me about Rs.200. It writes decently but I prefer to use my Parker Frontier over it.

Parker PROS: Many genuine resellersMany models are available across the price rangeSpecial editions are available in IndiaMany of them are made in India…Cuts down import dutiesBetter build qualityBaoer pens are also good…but not up to the mark in build qualityNot a prominent brand as parkerBAOER PROS: I like the antique feel in some pens offered by Baoer like this one…  Look at that one…I mean looook atttt thatttt one…That is damn sexy…Isn't it??
